name: Apple iMac
description: Transforming from underpowered to one of the fastest ultrathin laptops around, the MacBook Air with M1 is the best Mac for most people. It turbocharges that familiar design.

name: Apple Air Pod
description: Notebook Series - MacBook Pro, Processor Brand - Apple, Processor Model - Intel Core i5, 2.0GHz quad-core 10th-generation Intel Core i5 Processor, Turbo Boost up to 3.8GHz, Display Size - 13.3 Inch.

name: Dell Inspiron
description: The Inspiron 16 Plus (7610) is a top-notch value in a burgeoning category of laptops with 16-inch displays, capable Intel H-series CPUs, and Nvidia GeForce RTX graphics.

name: Dell XPS
description: Dell's multiple-award-winning XPS 13 ultraportable approaches perfection with a high-resolution OLED touch screen. It's not cheap, but it's irresistible once you lay eyes on it

name: HP Envy
description: HP Envy 15 (2021) is a Windows 10 Home laptop with a 15.60-inch display that has a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels. It is powered by a Core i7 processor.

name: HP Chromebook
description: HP Chromebook x360 14a (Intel) is a Chrome OS laptop with a 14.00-inch display that has a resolution of 1366x768 pixels. It is Celeron processor and it comes with 4GB of RAM.

name: Apple MacBook
description: The 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pros are powered by the M1 Pro or M1 Max processor. Either option is overkill for most users, but they do feature some other tantalizing upgrades.

name: Dell Alienware
description: The Dell Inspiron 15 3000 (3511) excels as a budget laptop that can handle day-to-day tasks and some very light gaming, and it even comes with Windows 11â€”all for under $400.

name: HP Pavilion
description: HP Pavilion 15 EG2036TU is a Windows 11 laptop with a 15.60-inch display that has a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels. It is powered by Core i5 processor and it comes with 16GB of RAM.
